title: Ugali
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring the water to a boil in a medium-sized pot.
Gradually add the maize flour to the boiling water while stirring continuously with a  (mwiko).
Keep stirring and turning the mixture to avoid lumps.
Continue to cook and stir until the mixture thickens and starts pulling away from the sides of the pot (about 10 minutes).
Shape the ugali into a mound, cover, and let it sit for a few minutes off the heat.
Serve hot with sukuma wiki, beef stew, or your preferred side dish.
